sqlMap.sql:
/* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type
, A.c_project , A.c_path , A.c_rev , A.c_author , A.c_commitdate , A.c_rv , A.c_bt , A.c_svnlog /* user filed add point*/
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getNodeIDs */ SELECT C_ID FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE c_commitdate like '%'||'2014-'||'%'
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_BT = #c_bt# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT < #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT > #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select:
/* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE
, c_project , c_path , c_rev , c_author , c_commitdate , c_rv , c_bt , c_svnlog FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
sqlMap.insert:
/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL , c_project , c_path , c_rev , c_author , c_commitdate , c_rv , c_bt , c_svnlog) VALUES ( S_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# , #c_project# , #c_path# , #c_rev# , #c_author# , #c_commitdate# , #c_rv# , #c_bt# , #c_svnlog# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_BTRV_ComprehensiveTree SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
